content.question: Trollope’s characterization of democracy in the second paragraph can best be seen as a direct reference to which aspect of the historical situation in the late nineteenth century?

choices.label: The political and social radicalism of the French Revolution
The emergence of strong labor unions in many industrialized countries
The movements to reform countries’ political systems by expanding the franchise
The resentment of the United States’ cultural influences in some European countries

content.answer: The movements to reform countries’ political systems by expanding the franchise

topic.text: 5.8: Reactions to the Industrial Economy from 1750 to 1900

skill.text: Skill 2.B: Explain the point of view, purpose, historical situation, and/or audience of a source.
